page.title: 09Henstridge
page.content: The village of Henstridge has a population of about 1000 people.It is made up mainly of residential areas but there is a trading estate operating on the old airstrip. There is always a lot going on in the village considering its size and most activities are very well supported. As the village expands it meets the larger village of Stalbridge which is also mainly residential. There is a great deal of concern at the moment about the fall in numbers at the village school as this prbably means a drop in the number of younger couples living in the village.
